subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Vancouver was awarded a Major League Soccer team, which will begin play in 2011 and join Toronto as the league’s second Canadian team. The N.B.A. star Steve Nash is part of the Vancouver ownership group. mls.
snippet: Vancouver was awarded a Major League Soccer team, which will begin play in 2011 and join Toronto as the league’s second Canadian team. The N.B.A. star Steve Nash is part of the Vancouver ownership group. mls.
